SELECT
p.projectId, p.title, p.thumbnail, p.endDate, p.projectStatus, p.goalAmount, p.currAmount,
r.rewardId, r.rewardName, r.rewardContent, r.deliveryDate,
b.backingId, b.amount, b.createdAt, b.backingStatus,
bd.price, bd.quantity
FROM backingDetail bd JOIN backing b ON b.backingId = bd.backingId JOIN reward r ON bd.rewardId= r.rewardId JOIN project p ON r.projectId = p.projectId
WHERE b.userId=#{userId} AND p.projectId=#{projectId}
